Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மறந்தும் பிறன்கேடு சூழற்க சூழின்அறஞ்சூழம் சூழ்ந்தவன் கேடு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Even though forgetfulness meditate not the ruin of another. Virtue will meditate the ruin of him who thus meditates.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person ('சூழ்ந்தவன்') is shown secretly plotting the ruin of another ('பிறன் கேடு சூழற்க'). Their malicious thoughts are visualized as a dark, thorny vine growing from their mind.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Unseen by the plotter, a powerful, radiant, and divine figure representing Virtue/Dharma ('அறம்') stands behind them. This figure is looking not at the intended victim, but at the plotter himself.
Layered_Composition.Background: The divine figure of Aram points a finger at the plotter, and the dark, thorny vine of malice instantly reverses its direction, turning back to ensnare and destroy its own creator ('அறம் சூழும் சூழ்ந்தவன் கேடு').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: If a person plots the ruin of another, the very principle of cosmic justice (Aram) will in turn plot the ruin of the plotter.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The thought-vine is a clear metaphor for the plot. The personification of Aram as a divine, judicial being makes the concept of cosmic justice tangible. The reversal of the vine is a direct, visual representation of karmic retribution.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Inevitable justice, karmic retribution, self-destructive, cautionary.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The plotter is shrouded in dark, conspiratorial shadows. The figure of Aram is a source of brilliant, pure, white light. The scene is a dramatic interplay of this divine light and the plotter's self-defeating darkness.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot from a third-person perspective that allows the viewer to see the plotter, their evil thought-vine, and the divine figure of Aram preparing the retribution, all in one frame.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, with strong ethereal effects for Aram and the symbolic vine.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, with Aram as the primary, righteous light source.

Cultural_Anchors: Aram/Virtue plotting the plotter's ruin (அறம் சூழும் சூழ்ந்தவன் கேடு)
